title: Interactive Case Study Design for Strengthening Collaboration Among Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of healthcare systems, team-based learning experience, and knowledge of teacher education
context.additional_context: Pre-service/in-service medical teachers designing and executing interdisciplinary collaboration scenarios in virtual hospital environments

learning_goals: Learners develop case study models analyzing interprofessional collaboration barriers in healthcare with 90% accuracy
Learners create three scenario-based models predicting role-specific emotional responses of medical staff using empathetic design techniques
Learners incorporate peer feedback at over 80% rates using team interaction rubrics in PBL environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
